Source code for Colors

##provided from stackoverflow
## https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15580303/python-output-complex-line-with-floats-colored-by-value
## where I first encountered the color codes for terminal output

[docs]class textMod:
    def __init__(self):
        self.HEADER = '\033[95m'
        self.blue = '\033[94m'
        self.randy = '\033[93m'
        self.green = '\033[92m'
        self.WARNING = '\033[93m'
        self.FAIL = '\033[91m'
        self.end = '\033[0m'
        self.BOLD = '\033[1m'
        self.UNDERLINE = '\033[4m'


[docs]    def getBlue(self):
        return self.blue
